rows.label: bf07230100_0010
rows.name: We have to cross that?

rows.label: bf07230100_0020
rows.name: Yes. But we must proceed with caution.

rows.label: bf07230100_0030
rows.name:
Once we enter, the Blades will be sapped of most of
their power.

rows.label: bf07230100_0040
rows.name:
If they run out of energy, they might be forced to
return to their core state.

rows.label: bf07230100_0050
rows.name: And there's a chance they could never be reawakened.

rows.label: bf07230100_0060
rows.name: Saika, you'd better just stay here and guard the fort.

rows.label: bf07230100_0070
rows.name: Why just me? Don't you want me?

rows.label: bf07230100_0080
rows.name:
Don't ask dumb questions.
You know very well why, don't you?

rows.label: bf07230100_0090
rows.name: If I'm staying, you ought to stay-

rows.label: bf07230100_0100
rows.name: I'll be fine. When am I ever not?

rows.label: bf07230100_0110
rows.name: If you're going, I'm-

rows.label: bf07230100_0120
rows.name: I'm ordering you to stay here!

rows.label: bf07230100_0130
rows.name: Is there something wrong?

rows.label: bf07230100_0140
rows.name: Saika was just agreeing to stay behind.

rows.label: bf07230100_0150
rows.name: Nuh-uh. I'm going with you!

rows.label: bf07230100_0160
rows.name:
We made a promise, didn't we?!
Don't you dare say you've forgotten!

rows.label: bf07230100_0170
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]

rows.label: bf07230100_0180
rows.name:
I go where you go.
End of story.

rows.label: bf07230100_0190
rows.name: Fine.

rows.label: bf07230100_0200
rows.name: My lady...

rows.label: bf07230100_0210
rows.name: I'm fine. We can't give up now we've come this far.

rows.label: bf07230100_0220
rows.name: Don't. I know what you're gonna say.

rows.label: bf07230100_0230
rows.name: I... Understood.

rows.label: bf07230100_0240
rows.name: I don't know what's in there.

rows.label: bf07230100_0250
rows.name:
But apart from Tora and Hana, we're all going to
find our abilities severely weakened.

rows.label: bf07230100_0260
rows.name: Be careful, Rex.

rows.label: bf07230100_0270
rows.name: Yes... Healing Arts are going to be less effective, too.

rows.label: bf07230100_0280
rows.name: One nasty wound and that'll be the end of you.

rows.label: bf07230100_0290
rows.name:
Yeah, I get that.
Tora, Hana, we'll need you on the front line.

rows.label: bf07230100_0300
rows.name: You got it, boss!

rows.label: bf07230100_0310
rows.name:
Hana is artificial Blade, so request is very
extremely not a problem!

rows.label: bf07230100_0320
rows.name:
Technology save the day!
Three cheers for Nopon know-how!

rows.label: bf07230100_0330
rows.name: Where are Hana's cheers?

rows.label: bf07230100_0340
rows.name: *chuckle* Thanks, guys!
